DialogTexts.Body: "Greetings Almighty Knight!\r\n             Stay awhile and listen.\                    r\n Welcome in the Kingdom of Retsis! A great evil...
invaded
our
land.
and
a
threaten
our
peaple.
he
plunderd
the
defendles
peasants
and
kidnepped
our
inosent
princes"
Brotheeer... I don't understaaand...
Leave me be!                                       I am busy...                   Just play!
I wanna play. But I don't know how...

Oh my God, Sis... Okay... Let's take a look.
First, move forward.
But how?
Just press that button, Suzy...
Oh, he is moving! Thank you.

Great. Now, move backwards, press this bu... 
What the ... happened to your keyboard?
Is it syrup???
Sorry Chris, I was thirsty... but a little accident happened...

Suzy, you are making my job harder every day...
The other control keys stuck.
I guess we have to use what we have... So, just press the forward button.
This is easy!

Brother!
I can't move along... Help meeeeeeee!

Okay, okay. Please calm down.
Let me take a look...
Oh! This trunk should not be here.
I bet you can solve this!
Actually, I have a friend, who gave me some codes...

Cheat codes?
I don't want to be a cheater!

Nooo... We don't cheat. This is just a little help.
First, I have to press enter, then type "cheatmode", enter.

Now I can see the object's name.
There are some basic commands.
To destroy an object I have to type "destroy", press space, then type the object name and press enter.
The capial letters does not matter when I type the names.
Hurray! Now I can move forward.
Brotheeer!

Oh, I guess I have to destroy, or disable that rock for you.
If I type "disable",press space, then type the object name, the rock will disappear.
Disabled objects can be enabled later.
You are so smart! Would you mind staying here to help me?

Nah... Okay...
Actually...
I have nothing else to do...
Can the Knight swim?

Why did you do that?
It is obvious that he cannot swim in that heavy armor.
We need a bridge!
I have to use the "enable" command on it.
Now you can pass safely.

Oh, we have crossed an island!
I loved to live on an island...
I didn't like the seagulls... They stole my pizza, do you remember?
Please open the door for me.

What happened with our gate?
It was here a minute ago!

The ctizens are too scared to go out and cut some wood.
Bring 25 wood for them!
I don't wanna do that. Do something please!
This is not how things work... You have to do their quest.

But collecting that much stuff is boring. I am a knight, not a woodcutter!
I have much more more important tasks.
I can do this for you, by enabling a wood pile. That should be enough to build another gate.
You have a noble heart, Knight! The villagers are grateful for getting wood for them.

Thank you for savig us, Noble Knight. We rely on your great power.
Our well is dry as the desert, we need a stong man to bring water to it.

You helped the villagers so much, they respect you as their hero.
But the sad thruth is the Kingdom has more serious problems to solve. An evil man kidnapped their beloved princess, and you seems to be the only person who can defeat him. Leave the village and find the evil fortress.
To support your mission we can offer you a sword. It was the property of the latst knight who entered our village, but he will not need it anymore...
Shiny!
It is all nice that you have a sword, but the attack button is stuck too.
A knight is not a knight without a sword!
Sometimes just active it. Use "activate" command.
The night is coming, it isn't safe to travel in the dark.
Be careful at night. A torch will be helpful.
Something is wrong with those animals...
The developers did not finish them...

Suzy?
What are you doing?
It is boooring!
Oh, come on! Do not give up, just press the forward button, we are almost there.
If you say so...
Do you see it, Chris? Is this a hut?
Somebody lives here...
This is a dark ritual! We have to stop it?!
Wati a second! There is a command to pause time. "speed 0" 0 is paused. 1 is normal. Best is 0.5.
The Dark Knight will never let you win! He will marry the princess and found a new, powerul Kingdom. You cannot stop him, prepare to die!

Finally, we are here!
This was a nice trick Brother.
It is getting more difficult...

Chris?
Chris!
Where did you go?

I saw it many times, it cannot be difficult...
Just wrote that I see on the screen.
I type "enable alltraps" and press enter.

Suzy!
What did you do again? I left you only for second , I had to answer the phone.
Please, let me write the codes.
Ah, finally we can meet personally. I have heard so much from you. But your fame means nothing, you have no chance against me.
We will see it!

White Knight, you are a cheater! You are much worse than me! You can tr to escape, but I know some dev commands too:
Activate loop!
Chris, you have to disable that loop. You can do it!

He is destroying the whole world! We cannot let him to do it, we have to save the princess.
Hurry, Suzy! Run as you can!
Type activate ant1ch3atm0de to enable the built in anti cheat mode!
Look! This is the King's castle! We did it!

Yeah!
By the way, when you disappeared earlier to pick up the phone... Who called you?
It was Dad.
Is he arrive home soon?
He can come in every minute.
Tomorrow we can play another game?
Sure...
